name: tc_19_EditingItemsNumbers
description: This test selects a number of men's clothing items in the requested sizes and colors, adds them to the cart, changes their quantity in the cart itself, and verifies that the quantity and price have changed to the required ones accordingly.
descriptionHtml: This test selects a number of men's clothing items in the requested sizes and colors, adds them to the cart, changes their quantity in the cart itself, and verifies that the quantity and price have changed to the required ones accordingly.

testStage.description: This test selects a number of men's clothing items in the requested sizes and colors, adds them to the cart, changes their quantity in the cart itself, and verifies that the quantity and price have changed to the required ones accordingly.

labels.name: story
labels.value: Selecting a number of men's clothing items in a variety of colors and sizes, adding them to the cart and changing the quantity
